hedline.hl1: Schoolteacher Accused In Sex Abuse of Student

abstract.p: Cobble Hill (Bklyn) High School teacher Nicole Philbert is arrested and charged with having four sexual encounters with a 15-year-old male student (S)

block.p: A teacher at a Brooklyn high school was arrested Thursday night and accused of sexually abusing one of her students.

The teacher, Nicole Philbert, 29, teaches global studies at Cobble Hill High School. There were four encounters between the teacher and her student, a 15-year-old boy, over four months at Ms. Philbert's home on Sullivan Street in Brooklyn, said Detective Joseph Pentangelo, a police spokesman. After the student told family members and friends about the encounters, a complaint was filed with the police.
A teacher at a Brooklyn high school was arrested Thursday night and accused of sexually abusing one of her students.

The teacher, Nicole Philbert, 29, teaches global studies at Cobble Hill High School. There were four encounters between the teacher and her student, a 15-year-old boy, over four months at Ms. Philbert's home on Sullivan Street in Brooklyn, said Detective Joseph Pentangelo, a police spokesman. After the student told family members and friends about the encounters, a complaint was filed with the police.
An investigation by the Brooklyn special-victims unit led to the arrest of Ms. Philbert, who was charged with four counts of sodomy and four counts of sexual abuse, said Detective Pentangelo.
